member.name: IAudioSessionNotification.OnSessionCreated
member.summary: The OnSessionCreated method notifies the registered processes that the audio session has been created.
member.param: Pointer to the interface of the audio session that was created.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAudioSessionNotification
member.summary: The IAudioSessionNotification interface provides notification when an audio session is created.
